SEARCH
Package ms.model

Class MineField

java.lang.Object
ms.model.MineField
public class MineField extends Object
The MineField class manages the grid of cells, mine placement, and adjacency calculations. It handles minefield initialization and provides access to individual cells.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new MineField with the specified dimensions and mine count.

  • Constructor Details

    • MineField

      public MineField(GridDimension dimensions, int mines)
      Constructs a new MineField with the specified dimensions and mine count. Initializes all cells but does not place mines until initializeGrid is called.
      Parameters:
      dimensions - the GridDimension defining the size of the minefield
      mines - the number of mines to be placed in the field

  • Method Details

    • getHeight

      public int getHeight()
      Returns:
      the number of rows in the field

    • getWidth

      public int getWidth()
      Returns:
      the number of columns in the field

    • getMines

      public int getMines()
      Returns:
      the number of mines in the field

    • getCell

      public Cell getCell(Position position)
      Gets the cell at the specified position.
      Parameters:
      position - the Position of the desired cell
      Returns:
      the Cell at the given position

    • initializeGrid

      public void initializeGrid(Position firstClickPosition)
      Initializes the minefield by placing mines randomly, excluding the first click position. This method should be called when the first cell is revealed.
      Parameters:
      firstClickPosition - the position of the first click, which will be mine-free

    • countAdjacentMines

      public int countAdjacentMines(Position center)
      Counts the number of mines adjacent to the specified position.
      Parameters:
      center - the center position to count around
      Returns:
      the number of adjacent mines (0-8)
      Throws:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the center position is invalid

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Compares this minefield with another object for equality. Two minefields are equal if they have the same dimensions and mine placement.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the object to compare with
      Returns:
      true if the objects are equal, false otherwise

    • hashCode

      public int hashCode()
      Returns a hash code for this minefield based on its dimensions and mine placement.
      Overrides:
      hashCode in class Object
      Returns:
      the hash code value
